content:
Here is Thunderbird for Android Community Forum. Based on my own experience, Thunderbird for Android does not display the "Please donate" page.

Are you referring to Thunderbird (for desktop) and its start page? If so, the following link might be helpful: How to disable or change the Thunderbird start page https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/how-disable-or-change-thunderbird-start-page
creator: Yu5tiqX9og

content:
Hi Paul

Direct import of emails from Thunderbird desktop into the mobile app is not supported. You can upload your desired emails to the server first, then download to the app.
creator: platform34
